      public final void create(String name, String user, String password, ODatabaseType type)
      Description copied from interface: OrientDBInternal
      Create a new database
      Specified by:
      create in interface OrientDBInternal
      Parameters:
      name - database name
      user - the username of a user allowed to create a database, in case of remote is a server user for embedded it can be left empty
      password - the password relative to the user
      type - can be plocal or memory

    • create

      public final void create(String name, String user, String password, ODatabaseType type, OrientDBConfig config)
      Description copied from interface: OrientDBInternal
      Create a new database
      Specified by:
      create in interface OrientDBInternal
      Parameters:
      name - database name
      user - the username of a user allowed to create a database, in case of remote is a server user for embedded it can be left empty
      password - the password relative to the user
      type - can be plocal or memory
      config - database specific configuration that override the factory global settings where needed.

    • exists

      public boolean exists(String name, String user, String password)
      Description copied from interface: OrientDBInternal
      Check if a database exists
      Specified by:
      exists in interface OrientDBInternal
      Parameters:
      name - database name to check
      user - the username of a user allowed to check the database existence, in case of remote is a server user for embedded it can be left empty.
      password - the password relative to the user
      Returns:
      boolean true if exist false otherwise.
